channel.title: Error...?
channel.description:
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String ind ex out of range: 24 at java.lang.String.getChars(String.java:850) at java.io.BufferedWriter.write(BufferedWriter.java:208) at client.savemoreinfo(client.java:26635) at client.process(client.java:13003) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:46)[/code]
This error crashes the server. when a certain persons game saves on my server.
Any one know how to solve it?[br][size=1]Posted on: February 06, 2007, 04:17:42 PM[/size][hr]Please?
